name: overpoweringly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is too strong to stop or resist: The overpoweringly fragrant shop stocks just about every spice you can imagine. For many of the people who came to see the show, it was an overpoweringly emotional experience.
More examplesFewer examplesI brushed my teeth, but the toothpaste tasted overpoweringly strong. There was an overpoweringly strong odour of tobacco smoke in the room. The music was intense, sometimes overpoweringly so. The author captures the overpoweringly intense feelings of adolescence.
